MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property HasMipMap As Boolean

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the mipmap hint is enabled on this drawable's bitmap.
Docs.value: True if the mipmap hint is set, false otherwise. If the bitmap is null, this method always returns false.

member this.TileModeX : Android.Graphics.Shader.TileMode with get, set

Docs.summary: Indicates the repeat behavior of this drawable on the X axis. -or- Sets the repeat behavior of this drawable on the X axis.
Docs.value: android.graphics.Shader.TileMode#CLAMP if the bitmap does not repeat, android.graphics.Shader.TileMode#REPEAT or android.graphics.Shader.TileMode#MIRROR otherwise.
